name: Space Invaders 3D (Flozer)
description:
Description:

In this game you play as a ship that protects its planet from the attack of the enemy fleet. You have to destroy as many asteroids and enemy ships as possible.

How to play:

You start by a ship that has 3 HP. Later you will be able to pick up flying bonus health points. On you will be flying asteroids. To destroy a large asteroid you need to hit it with a projectile 3 times. But if he in you crashes the he will take from you 3 HP. With the enemy ship as well. To destroy the average asteroid need 2 projectiles. Will take away so much same HP. To destroy a small asteroid you need only one projectile of your ship. Will take away so much same HP.

Controls:
Movement by ship: WASD or arrows 

Left laser shot: left mouse button

Right laser shot: right mouse button
